89X_1032.memo:
中文授課
 課程目標：
Signal and Systems is a basic course for further studies in signal processing, communication systems, and control systems. This course covers the fundamental tools used in continuous-time and discrete-time signal and system analysis. Matlab computer assignments are included to help students acquire an in-depth understanding of the key concepts
 課程綱要：
1.	Fundamental concepts (Chaps. 1 & 2 of textbook)
2.	Continuous-time signals – time-domain (Chap. 3)
3.	Continuous-time systems – time-domain (Chap. 4)
4.	Continuous-time signals – frequency-domain (Chap. 5)
5.	Continuous-time systems – frequency-domain (Chap. 6)
6.	Laplace transform (Chap. 7)
7.	Sampling (Chap. 9)
8.	Discrete-time signals – time-domain (Chap. 10)
9.	Discrete-time systems – time-domain (Chap. 11)
10.	Discrete-time signals – frequency-domain (Chap. 12)
11.	Discrete-time systems – frequency-domain (Chap. 13)
12.	z-transform (Chap. 14

1.	G. E. Carlson, Signal and Linear System Analysis, 2nd ed., Wiley, 1998. (Textbook)
